item.title: CCUS-keycloak-long-time-access
item.description: In order to provide access token for CCUS project(K-spice adaptor) temporarily set the length to be 60 days: Add Client: Add Roles: “user”: Click “Add selected” -> “user” from “Available roles”

item.title: Connect-to-VM-within-your-PC
item.description: by default VM could not visit host PC Here is the way to make the communication channel work: Connect to wifi: KDI-IoT Change the connected wifi property to “private”: eg: Create an inbound rule within firewall:

item.title: Guacamole dockerÂ installation
item.description: background info: Baiyun project from Mu team(ouyang, dapeng) needs this feature. Official ref: https://guacamole.apache.org/doc/gug/guacamole-docker.html client backup: guacamole-backup.sql TODO: Change the mysql psw below to a more secure one. Change the Guacamode login psw (default is guacadmin/guacadmin) Set up docker container restart policy SCP to linux server Script of installation for Baiyun project: //use latest version(202303) docker pull guacamole/guacd:1.5.0 docker pull guacamole/guacamole:1.5.0 //mysql v8 encounters error: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLNonTransientConnectionException: Public Key Retrieval is not allowed //use latest v.

item.title: How to use git
item.description: How to use git to commit ç¡®ä¿æœ¬åœ°ä»£ç åœ¨masteråˆ†æ”¯ï¼Œå¹¶æ‹‰å–æœ€æ–°çš„è¿œç«¯ä»£ç æ‹‰å–æœ€æ–°çš„è¿œç«¯ä»£ç run git remote updatecmd åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°masteråˆ†æ”¯ run git checkout mastercmd æŸ¥çœ‹å½“å‰çŠ¶æ€ run git statuscmd æŸ¥çœ‹æ‰€æœ‰åˆ†æ”¯åˆ—è¡¨ run git branch --allcmd create your branch base on master branch run git checkoutcmd. eg: git checkout -b feature-use-git origin/master push your branch to origin run git pushcmd. eg: git push origin feature-use-git add your content run git addcmd. eg: git add . commit your content to local run git commitcmd.

item.title: Practical Software Chapter
item.description: ‘- Record screen and output to gif format. here is the [tool]’(https://www.screentogif.com/)

item.title: Problem-and-fix-when-sending-code-using-Teams
item.description: How to reproduce: One would like to share this code(ktw add environment t https://dev.poc.kognitwin.cn/api --idp=keycloak --tenantId dev-poc --clientId twin-devicelogin --authServerUrl https://auth.ops.kognitwin.cn/ ) with colleague. The code is like: One copies and pastes to Teams: Colleague copies from Teams but found the code does not work: the problem is within Teams because Teams does some changes to space character (convert space to non breaking space): Showing pasted code from Teams in Notepad++ How to solve: Use Code snippet in Teams when sending code: ref: When pasting SQL into Teams, spaces get switched to NonBreaking Spaces and prevent SQL from running

item.title: dev-team-info
item.description: Info Welcome to the dev team! ğŸ‘ Please read below standards carefully and come up with a better suggestions if you have any. Let’s together build the BEST dev team! FYI: Please be aware the info/work log you provide on coding.net platform will be evaluated towards your KPI assessment. Team members Task Assignment and execution Task assignment is done via https://kdic.coding.net/ platformã€‚ Executor will get an email when task is assigned.
